Hotel

HYATT ZIVA LOS CABOS
Paseo Malecón Sn Lote 5
Zona Hotelera, San Jose del Cabo

Mexico, 23405, Tel1: +52 624 163 7730

VeriStor has arranged special hotel room rates with the Ziva Hyatt Cabo during the event. If you would like to extend your visit, the negotiated room rate is $350.64 per night for single occupancy; $219.39 per person per night for double occupancy ($438.78 for two people in one room per night)--this is an all-inclusive per person rate per night. Children ages 2-12 will be $89 per day to share a room with their parents. A third person over 12 years old in the room is $176.22. We ask the participants not to contact the hotel directly.

The regular check-in time at the hotel is 3:00PM. An earlier check-in is subject to availability. The official check-out time of the hotel is 12:00 pm. Luggage storage will be provided through the bell desk at the hotel.

Other Information

Airline arrangements: Airline reservations will be made via a link on the registration page.

Airport Transportation To/From: Round trip airport transportation to/from Los Cabos International Airport (SJD) to Ziva Hyatt Cabo will be provided. You will meet the transportation team once you retrieve your luggage. More information will be provided prior to the trip. Transportation will be provided back to the airport.

Attire: Dress according to activity selections, please see activity list for specific dress and other requirements. Please note that there are restaurants on the hotel property that require dress slacks for men.
• Welcome Reception - Resort festive, slacks, collared shirt for men, casual dress or skirt for ladies.
• Celebration Dinner - Resort dress, slacks, collard shirt, for men, festive dress for ladies.

Weather: The average temperature during May is comfortable, with temperatures hovering in the mid-80s.

Check out what Cabo San Lucas has to offer!

Luxury Sailing Snorkel Race

Experience luxury and relaxation onboard a magnificent 50-foot sailing yacht. Designed for smooth sailing with modern facilities and wide berths, this unique ‘all inclusive’ adventure allows you to explore the stunning bays of Los Cabos. As we hoist the sail (relax, our professional team will do all the work), lay back and enjoy the ocean breeze as we search for a secluded bay where we drop anchor for fun activities. Soak up the sun or dive into the depths where you can enjoy amazing snorkeling with professional guides.

Dune Buggy Adventure

Golf at Club Campestre

Club Campestre is a fabulous 18 hole, Nicklaus Design golf course. Spread across the gently rolling foothills of the Sierra del la Laguna Mountains, between the mountains and the sea, the course offers spectacular views from every hole. With its seamless, dramatic interplay with the raw natural beauty of the Baja California desert, this gem of a golf course will draw you back for game after game. Club Campestre San Jose invites you to enjoy the incredible panoramic views, dramatic elevation changes and undulating championship greens created specifically for us, and for this very special piece of property, by one of the great Masters of the game.

Spa

At Zen Spa, the closer you are to nature, the closer you are to yourself. Therefore, the spa is designed so that you can enjoy all of the benefits that the surrounding environment has to offer, including treatments involving fresh water and aromic essences. Zen Spa features lavish steam baths and saunas where you can enjoy the benefits of both wet and dry heat. The spa also includes a plunge pool for guests who wish to revitalize with cold water, and hydrotherapy is available to ensure your muscles and mind enter a state of complete relaxation. Additionally, guests can choose to pamper themselves at Zen Spa’s luxurious beauty salon.

For any assistance on site please contact:
Transportation & Logistics: Brooke Sommers (720) 530-5474
Hotel: Rachel Paci (703) 975-6425
